L2

	
	
summary

	
		These are things that should be in an L2
		and not an L1.
		
		
	
possibilities

	
		[ ] friends roster

		[ ] quarantine lists
			
				If a business seems malicious, then 
				they can be added to the Quarantine
				List.
				
					For instance, if they are sending
					data that if not equal to the data
					sent by other businesses.
